com.uploadcare.android.library.api

Class RequestHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.uploadcare.android.library.api.RequestHelper

  • public class RequestHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class for doing API calls to the Uploadcare API. Supports API version 0.4. TODO Support of throttled requests needs to be added

      • executeCommand

        public com.squareup.okhttp.Response executeCommand(java.lang.String requestType,
                                                   java.lang.String url,
                                                   boolean apiHeaders,
                                                   com.squareup.okhttp.RequestBody requestBody)
        Executes the request et the Uploadcare API and return the HTTP Response object. The existence of this method(and it's return type) enables the end user to extend the functionality of the Uploadcare API client by creating a subclass of UploadcareClient.
        Parameters:
        requestType - request type (ex. "GET", "POST", "DELETE");
        url - request url
        apiHeaders - TRUE if the default API headers should be set
        requestBody - body of POST request, used only with request type REQUEST_POST.
        Returns:
        HTTP Response object

      • executeCommandAsync

        public void executeCommandAsync(Context context,
                                java.lang.String requestType,
                                java.lang.String url,
                                boolean apiHeaders,
                                RequestCallback callback,
                                com.squareup.okhttp.RequestBody requestBody)
        Executes the request et the Uploadcare API and return the HTTP Response object. The existence of this method(and it's return type) enables the end user to extend the functionality of the Uploadcare API client by creating a subclass of UploadcareClient.
        Parameters:
        context - application context. @link android.content.Context
        requestType - request type (ex. "GET", "POST", "DELETE");
        url - request url
        apiHeaders - TRUE if the default API headers should be set
        callback - callback RequestCallback
        requestBody - body of POST request, used only with request type REQUEST_POST.

      • encodeHex

        protected static char[] encodeHex(byte[] data)
        * Converts an array of bytes into an array of characters representing the hexadecimal values of each byte in order. The returned array will be double the length of the passed array, as it takes two characters to represent any given byte.
        Parameters:
        data - a byte[] to convert to Hex characters
        Returns:
        array of characters the hexadecimal values of each byte in order
